name: Double Dealer
description:
The Double Dealer is trying to become infamous and recorded in the annals of history. They are attempting to do this by mimicking the ways of Lupin and Robin Hood: robbing and stealing from rich and powerful people. The Double Dealer actually consists of 2 people but they both work under the alias of 1. 1 of the Dealers do most of the research and acquire information while the other does most of the groundwork with his amazing hacking skills.

 

Their story starts from their first heist together which was the Great Museum Heist.
